TITLE.P: Pan-London CHC in nursing homes AQP 18/19

SHORT_DESCR.P: London Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG) commissioners seek applications for the provision of continuing healthcare services in nursing homes. The Any Qualified Provider (AQP) process covers service users eligiblefor continuing healthcare mental health adult (including dementia) and continuing healthcare physical disabilities adult (including frail elderly) including end of life care. Service users must be over 18 years old.

The pan-London CHC in nursing homes AQP is open for applications from 13.11.2018 to 22.12.2017. Successful providers will be added to an AQP list which will be used by London Clinical Commissioning Groups (CCGs) and discharge teams to make continuing healthcare placements in nursing homes. The AQPis the standard route of commissioning for the participating CCGs. This means that care packages will be commissioned with AQP providers. Only in exceptional circumstances will packages be commissioned with non-AQP providers.
For further information please see https://procontract.due-north.com or contact: lph.nursinghomesaqp@nhs.net
